it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Common.Network

Interface MsgConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMIMsgConnection, SocketMsgConnection

    public interface MsgConnection
    interface implemented by the client network classes which define all the functionality offered by the client network architecture. MsgConnection will be implemented both by socket classes which handle the communication via socket and RMI classes which handle the RMI communication mode.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      close the network connection that was precedently opened
      java.lang.String getMessage()
      allow to retrive messages sent by the server to the client
      boolean hasMessage()
      tells if there are messages for the client
      void open(java.lang.String ip, int port)
      open the network connection
      void sendMessage(java.lang.String message)
      send a message to the server, a client message is simply a string (generally it will be the string representation of a JSON packet, which will be parsed and then processed by the Game thread)

      • hasMessage

        boolean hasMessage()
            throws java.io.IOException
        tells if there are messages for the client
        Returns:
        true if the server has sent a message to the client which must be get, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
